alert.note: Alert for Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central York and central Strafford Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rochester, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Sanford, Dover, Somersworth, Barrington, Berwick, Farmington, Lebanon, Madbury, Milton and North Berwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
